Package CardPickup

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    Contains move type and node ID of an attacker action
    Card
    The Card class simply represents a playing card - including its image and value.
    GameMaster
    Pits Attacker and Defender agents against one another in the name of Science! STUDENTS: add your Player to the sections in main that say "add Players here".
    GameProfile
    Auxiliary class for storing information about the game.
    Graph
    Creates graphs of nodes that contain cards and possible cards
    Hand
    Hand is the class that describes the cards in a player's hand.
    HandEvaluator
    The HandEvaluator is a class that is used to rank hands numerically.
    MaxPower
    Some important variables inherited from the Player Class: protected Node[] graph; //Contains the entire graph protected Hand hand; //Contains your current hand (Use the cardsHole array list) protected int turnsRemaining; //Number of turns before the game ends protected int currentNode; //Your current location protected int oppNode; //Opponent's current position protected Card oppLastCard; //Opponent's last picked up card Important methods inherited from Player Class: Method that is used to determine if a move is valid.
    Node
    Node class for creating nodes in the graph.
    Parameters
    Defines parameter variables used in simulation
    Parser
    Make sure you add the CSV jar to your library.
    Player
    Player agent.
    PlayerProfile
    Auxiliary class for player management.
    TestPlayer
    Some important variables inherited from the Player Class: protected Node[] graph; //Contains the entire graph protected Hand hand; //Contains your current hand (Use the cardsHole array list) protected int turnsRemaining; //Number of turns before the game ends protected int currentNode; //Your current location protected int oppNode; //Opponent's current position protected Card oppLastCard; //Opponent's last picked up card Important methods inherited from Player Class: Method that is used to determine if a move is valid.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ActionType
    Special enumerated type to specify an action
